articles.image_title: FILE - A pro-Russian rebel looks up while riding on a tank flying Russia's flag, on a road east of Donetsk, eastern Ukraine, July 29, 2015. Amid fears of a Russian invasion of Ukraine, tensions have also soared in the countryÄôs east, where Ukrainian forces are locked in a nearly eight-year conflict with Russia-backed separatists.
